# balatro

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of balatro is to calculate scores in [balatro](https://www.playbalatro.com/).

## Installation

You can install the development version of balatro from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("mathiaslj/balatro")
```
